name: Worplesdon Place

reviews.text: We have lived in Guildford, and heavily debated between this location and the other Guildford Premier Inn. This hotel has a restaurant below, and used to be independent - so we weren't too sure since it had been taken over by Premier Inn. What a surprise!
reviews.title: Fantastic Gem for families

description: A 21 room hotel in the beautiful rural village of Worplesdon, just 5 miles from Guildford town centre. Set in a 19th Century manor house the Worplesdon Place combines traditional features with modern facilities.Our grill style restaurant is set in the main old building with period features and views out onto the terrace. We are open for food every day from 8am for breakfast through to 9:30pm for evening meals.Our modern spacious bar is on the ground floor and opens up into the extensive beer garden which features a lake and its own resident family of black swans.
